about_the_game:
Unleash Mayhem and Survive the Swarm in Gunbug!

Step into the exoskeleton of a heavily armed centipede in Gunbug, a top-down 2D shoot 'em up where survival means wielding a massive arsenal against relentless hordes of enemies. Start with just your sharp mandibles to fend off foes and gradually build your ultimate loadout of devastating weaponry. Whether playing solo or teaming up with up to nine friends, Gunbug offers a thrilling experience filled with non-stop action, epic boss battles, and challenging levels.

Key Features:

  • Multi-Gun Madness: Use your multitude of hands to carry and fire a variety of weapons simultaneously. Experience the sheer satisfaction of mowing down enemies with an overwhelming barrage of firepower.
  • Challenging Levels: Battle through intense levels filled with swarms of enemies that increase in difficulty. Each level culminates in a boss fight that tests your skills and strategy.
  • Upgrade and Customize: Collect resources and power-ups to enhance your centipede. Unlock new weapons and abilities to increase your survival odds.
  • Multiplayer Mayhem: Join forces with up to ten players in cooperative multiplayer mode. Coordinate your attacks and strategies to survive longer and take down tougher enemies.

Experience the Ultimate Power Trip:

Gunbug focuses on the pure, unadulterated joy of defeating thousands upon thousands of enemies. With each wave, unleash devastating firepower and carve your path to victory. The more enemies you defeat, the stronger and more unstoppable you become.
